Interface ModifiableVirtualPortal

public interface ModifiableVirtualPortal
extends VirtualPortal, ModifiableIdentifiable, ModifiableLocalized

Method Detail

setRealm

java.lang.String setRealm(java.lang.String aRealm)
                          throws CannotModifyPropertyException,
                                 ModelException
Sets the virtual portal's realm.

Parameters:
aRealm - The new realm of the virtual portal
Returns:
the former realm or null if none has been set.
Throws:
CannotModifyPropertyException - in case the realm cannot be set
ModelException

confirmSetRealm

boolean confirmSetRealm(java.lang.String aRealm)
Indicates if the given realm may be set.

Parameters:
aRealm - The new realm of the virtual portal
Returns:
true if the specified realm may be set, false otherwise
